original_text: And the priest shall make an atonement for him before the Lord: and it shall be forgiven him for any thing of all that he hath done in trespassing therein.
korean_text: 제사장은 여호와 앞에서 그를 위하여 속죄한즉 그는 무슨 허물이든지 사함을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall make an atonement for him
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 그를 위해 속죄를 하게 되리라

sentences.original_text: and it shall be forgiven him
for any thing of all that he hath done
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 행한 모든 것 중 어떤 것에 대하여
